unnormalised: Hey everyone, return policies, right? It's like picking the right biryani spices! I once bought a saree online, total *dhoka*. The color was so off! Thankfully, they had a decent return policy. Needed it refunded before Onam too! Shopkeepers in Delhi *know* returns are key. Rs. 5000 wasted otherwise!
normalised: Hey everyone, return policies, right? It's like picking the right biryani spices! I once bought a saree online, total dhoka. The color was so off! Thankfully, they had a decent return policy. Needed it refunded before Onam too! Shopkeepers in Delhi know returns are key. Rupee five thousand wasted otherwise!
